oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Smokey Smith Enterprises Job No. 36570
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Accounting; Hatch Show Print (Firm); Husky, Ferlin; Price, Ray, 1926-2013; Wells, Kitty;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Invoice (No. 1125) for an order placed by Smokey Smith Enterprises for 800 two color window cards for a performance by Ferlin Husky and Kitty Wells at the KRNT Theater in Des Moines, Iowa on March 28. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.
